#Alan Kuang's CMake file for Arch Linux
#to use you must put all assets within the build folder
#autogenerated
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.12)
project(build VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES C CXX)

#finds sdl2 and png addon
#if it doesn't find it it won't compile, <REQUIRED>
find_package(SDL2 REQUIRED)
find_package(SDL2_image REQUIRED)

#including directories for both sdl2 libs
include_directories(${SDL2_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${SDL2_IMAGE_INCLUDE_DIRS})


#autogenerated
include(CTest)
enable_testing()

#add_executable(build main.cpp)
#this is the number of cpp files you want to build, separated by space
add_executable(build  main.cpp Game.cpp MainWindow.cpp Input.cpp Item.cpp Player.cpp Graphics.cpp Sword.cpp Collisions.cpp Inventory.cpp HealthPotion.cpp Tile.cpp Enemy.cpp)

#keeps crap from breaking
target_link_libraries(build SDL2_image SDL2)

#links libraries
target_link_libraries(build ${SDL2_LIBRARIES} ${SDL2_IMAGE_LIBRARIES})


#autogenerated
set(CPACK_PROJECT_NAME ${PROJECT_NAME})
set(CPACK_PROJECT_VERSION ${PROJECT_VERSION})
include(CPack)
